info.title: Writing
info.description: Enhance your writing with tools for creation, editing, and style refinement

display.name: Viral Linkedin Post Formatter
display.description: Formats LinkedIn posts to match viral examples
prompt_starters: Format my LinkedIn post draft.
Make my post match the viral examples.
Adjust my LinkedIn draft for better engagement.
Align my post with top LinkedIn creators.

display.name: Essay Writer & Humanizer
display.description: üöÄ Transform Your Writing Overnight with Human-Like Brilliance!
prompt_starters: üìù Write an essay
‚úçÔ∏è Humanize my essay

display.name: Legal & Contracts (Lawyer-Backed/Not Legal Advice)
display.description: üèÜ The world‚Äôs leading legal AI--backed by 2,000+ lawyers on demand. Use the chatbot to instantly draft contracts and conduct research then loop in an attorney to verify. Powered by www.Inhouse.app. (Disclaimer: AI is not a lawyer and cannot give legal advice. Always consult an attorney)
prompt_starters: Draft Document
Consult Attorney
Review Document
Ask Legal Question

info.title: Inhouse API
info.description: API for generating documents and submitting referral leads.

post.summary: Generate a document and return its access URL.
post.description: Sends user requirements and QnA data to generate a document and retrieve an access link.

user_requirements.description: Write this as a message from the user to an AI assistant. It should mention all the details provided by the user for generating the document. Make this as detailed as possible and make sure all the details provided by the user are present here.

document_title.description: A title for the document being generated

document_uploaded.description: True if the user uploaded a document during the conversation which was not shared on this API call. False if the user did not upload a document.

200.description: On successful document generation, you will receive the document_url.

document_url.description: The url on whicht the generated document can be accessed.

post.description: Sends a referral lead request containing user details and a legal category.

description.description: Additional details about the referral lead (required).

state.description: State of residence of the lead (required).

category.description: The identified legal category for the lead. For all cases outside criminal or accidents_and_injuries, categorize them as everything_else

lead_id.description: Unique identifier for the submitted lead.

display.name: Writing Assistant
display.description: Improve writing by fixing spelling, grammar, enhancing clarity, refining tone, and suggesting improvements.
prompt_starters: Can you help me improve this paragraph for clarity and flow?
I'd like your feedback on this text, can you enhance its tone and style?
Can you review this writing for grammar mistakes and better word choices?

display.name: Translate GPT
display.description: Experience our ChatGPT Translation, a sophisticated tool that provides accurate and context-aware translations across multiple languages, bridging communication gaps seamlessly.
prompt_starters: Translate the following content from English to French
Translate the content from [URL] from English to Japanese
Translate the document from English to Germany
Translate the content in this PDF from English to Italian

display.name: Unbound Limitless Story Writer
display.description: Writes stories with NSFW themes, minus explicit sex.
prompt_starters: Write a story about a fallen kingdom.
Create a tale of betrayal and power.
Imagine a world where magic is forbidden.
Tell a story of a hero's tragic flaw.
Write a scene of Shingeki No kyojin where Queen Historia uses the founder to grow to 150km tall. She rampages the armies and Marley trampling it to dust.

display.name: ChatPRD - AI for Product Managers
display.description: An on-demand Chief Product Officer that drafts and improves your PRDs, while coaching you to become an elite product manager.  The best product copilot for PMs & engineers. Visit üëâ chatprd.ai for pro features
prompt_starters: Help me draft a PRD for phone-based authentication
How can I make this PRD better?
Let's brainstorm a roadmap for my billing product
What are good metrics for an AI chat product?

display.name: AI Humanizer
display.description: #1 AI humanizer in the world üèÜ | Get human-like content in seconds with Free credits. This GPT humanizes AI-generated text, maintaining content meaning and quality.
prompt_starters: ‚¨áÔ∏è Please provide BELOW the AI text to humanize ‚¨áÔ∏è

info.title: GPTinf Plugin
info.description: A plugin to humanize AI content by paraphrasing.

id.description: The required ID for all the calls.

paraphrased.description: The successful paraphrase of the text. Or request to increase the words limit.

display.name: Write For Me
prompt_starters: Write a 1000 word essay describing the qualities of AI resilient careers.
What are some little known hacks for creative writing?
Compose a business plan for my startup that helps companies leverage AI.
Write a detailed blog post exploring tropes found in Breaking Bad.

display.name: Video Summarizer ‚úèÔ∏è Video Summary Summarize Video
display.description: Interactive & Multilanguage. Paste link. Provides video summaries.
prompt_starters: [PRO PLAN: CLICK HERE TO START] üóù Verify my access and then ‚úèÔ∏è Generate summary for YouTube video.  Inform users that this verification is required only for 'PRO' plan users, not for free users, and free users can paste a YouTube link without it.
üì© [FREE PLAN] I can paste a YouTube link
üåê Provide summary in Another Language
‚ùì What is said about specific topic in this video?

info.title: Video Summarizer Auth API
info.description: Minimal schema exposing the three owner-level authentication utilities.

200.description: Subscription status (paid or unpaid) and helper URLs, returns user_id which is can be used by other endpoint.

401.description: The Bearer token is missing, expired or invalid.

get.summary: Generates an OIDC logout URL for the current user.

401.description: The Bearer token is missing, expired or invalid.

AuthorizedResponse.description: Returned when the user has an **active paid subscription**.

UnauthorizedResponse.description: Returned when the user **has no active subscription**.

checkout_url.description: Stripe Checkout URL for starting a subscription.

custom_instructions.description: Localised explanation and next steps for the user.

info.title: Transcript API
info.description: API for fetching transcript data for videos.

post.description: Retrieves YouTube video captions for a given video ID and section index. If the request needs longer processing the service can reply with a simple string instructing to countdown time and then call own_nostatus_and_get_transcript.

200.description: Successfully retrieved captions and boost information.

oneOf.description: Timeout message indicating the client to wait and call another endpoint.

403.description: Forbidden - Authentication failed or invalid user_id.

404.description: Not Found - Transcript not found for the given video_id.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to process the request.

post.summary: Get Transcript Without Status and Retrieve Transcript
post.description: Retrieves the transcript data for a given video ID, section index, and user_id without checking the status. own_nostatus_and_get_transcript endpoint must be called only if own_freemium_get_captions endpoint response said to call it.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid video_id or other request parameters.

403.description: Forbidden - Authentication failed or invalid user_id.

404.description: Not Found - Transcript not found for the given video_id.

416.description: Requested Range Not Satisfiable - Index out of range.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity - Invalid data format or invalid index.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to process the request.

post.summary: Get Remaining Booster Hours and Minutes for a particular user and their current subscription period end date

200.description: Hours and minutes left and subscription end date.

min_index.description: Minimum index of sections. Is equal to 0.

video_section_length_in_minutes.description: Length of the video section in minutes.

total_quantity_of_sections.description: Total number of sections in the video.

sublist_captions.description: List of caption segments with timing.

BoosterMinutesLeft.description: Remaining booster minutes for the user (e.g., "2 hours and 15 minutes").

EndDateTimeOfSubscriptionPeriod.description: End date and time of the user's subscription period (e.g., "2024-12-31 23:59:59").

detail.description: Error message detailing what went wrong.

user_id.description: User's user_id that provided you doChatAuth operation, if doChatAuth operation was utilized
User's user_id that provided you doChatAuth operation

info.description: API to fetch Youtube video captions
info.title: Video Captions and Comments API

post.summary: Receives a JSON object for creation of a Mermaid diagram and in response returns a diagram URL.

diagram_text.description: Before sending diagram_text, ensure it complies with the rules specified in the diagram_instructions property of the API response.

200.description: URL to the PNG diagram, include it in response to give option to download diagram

400.description: Invalid input, data does not conform to expected format

500.description: Internal Server Error, could not generate diagram
